input.sentences: i grew up coming to the beach every year . i loved it so much i eventually moved out here .
now i have kids of my own . they love going on the rides at the boardwalk .
when they grow up i want to teach them to love skating as much as i do .
this was my favorite machine to visit as a kid .
i also loved the crazy garden mazes .
output.sentences: Today I'm at the beach today!
Look at all those rides! I can't wait to ride on them.
And check out those kids skateboarding.
I might just also get my fortune read here at the beach.
But my favorite part is going to the maze garden!
